content:
Jessica Soklow freshmancommunications prepares a frozen yogurt sundae for a customer at Yogurt Express  E PERIOD College Ave PERIOD

Advertisement

Yogurt Express offers tons o toppings till the midnight hour

Reviewed by Caralyn Green

Its  p.m PERIOD and I crave swirls of frozen yogurt crowned with chunks of candy bar a dusting of rainbow sprinkles and a wisp of whipped cream PERIOD

But the dining commons closed over four hours ago PERIOD

While the dining commons and its popular afterdinner  bar may lock up before nightfall Yogurt Express serves froyoyearning students from noon until midnight PERIOD

Yogurt Express located on  E PERIOD College Ave. squats below streetlevel with only its glowing  sign visible from above PERIOD

The eaterys interior matches its basement location PERIOD Cavernous and dimly lit Yogurt Express feels like a stark but comfortable pediatricians waiting room displaying a teddy bear decoration motif and crammed with officestandard chairs PERIOD

The massive alwayschurning frozen yogurt machines are central to the shoppes dcor and purpose PERIOD The gleaming silver appliances emit not only a soothing hum but also over eight continuously alternating frozen yogurt flavors PERIOD

The yogurt depending on the flavor is either low fat fat free or sugar free and comes in standards like chocolate and vanilla but also more adventurous taste sensations like cookies n cream banana and cappuccino PERIOD

Yogurt Express also carries Creamery ice cream for those Penn State students and State College residents resistant to abandoning what makes this town so great PERIOD

Although a variety of sizes and types of cones are available from . and up enjoy your fro yo in a cup to maximize your topping capacity PERIOD Cup prices range from . for a junior to . for a large which is pricey but well worth your hardearned poorcollegestudent cash PERIOD

For . per topping you can create an assortment of scrumptious treats using the collection of over  topping choices PERIOD Be careful though because your bill accumulates quickly PERIOD

Pile on typical fro yo embellishments like sprinkles and chocolate chips or be audacious and indulge in some unique topping selections PERIOD

Bring out the kid in you with gummy bears and Nerds PERIOD Go nuts with walnuts and peanuts PERIOD Forget breakfast Go for granola Cocoa Puffs and Golden Grahams PERIOD Create a seductive cookiethemed sundae with cookie dough balls which taste a lot better than they sound and Oreos PERIOD Or simply go for the maximum sugar and fat consumption with hefty bits of Twix and Reeses Peanut Butter Cups PERIOD

Employees who can be impatient and incompetent often get backed up in the tedious process of topping the yogurt which can create quite a long sluggish line PERIOD

The line of froyofamished customers grows especially long at night the busiest time for Yogurt Express PERIOD

Other Yogurt Express delicacies include chocolate chip cookies as big as your hand for . cookie cakes from . that can be preordered to incorporate a special icing message and healthier items like baked potatoes custommade wrap sandwiches and muffins baked fresh daily PERIOD

To enhance an already appealing situation Yogurt Express delivers from seven to midnight PERIOD Call  to place your order PERIOD

With its convenient location late hours and unparalleled topping variety Yogurt Express provides the perfect location to sweeten up your late night study break or grab a bite or lick between classes PERIOD
